There is no sprint, so you're stuck walking everywhere at a snail's pace with every step feeling awkward.

This game is the very definition of pay-to-win. You start off with a Luger pistol and that's the only weapon available to you at the start ( aside from the Pickaxe ) that you don't have to buy. You go into the shop and notice all of the more interesting and fun weapons are either locked or are too expensive. In order to buy anything worthwhile in the store, you'd have to spend hours upon hours playing this arduous and monotonous game. Gold and experience takes ages to obtain. 0.5 gold.

My first and only match of this game I played, I earned a total of 9 gold. I was not at the bottom of the leaderboard, mind you, no I topped my team's leaderboard and I was rewarded with 9 gold. If you value your time, don't waste it playing this game. It's boring, slow, and is yet another attempt to try rob you of your hard-earned cash. reviewText:
Ok...I decided to give this game a fair chance and play it for a while and not judge it directly of first impressions...but this is just enough time given and I can't stand it more because its currently very bad and its frustrating to play....so here are some Pros and Cons

Pros:
- Game looks nice and runs smooth
- Destruction animation looks nice also
- A lot of cool game mods to chose and play (Zombies, Hide and Seek, Hunger Games, Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Castle Wars, Run, Capture the Flag, Free Build)
- Guns
- Build things and destroy like in Minecraft
- Lot of variety of guns, blocks, skins and other stuff
- Nice Emotions
- Waiting Lobby has little Parkour to play with until the game starts


Cons (GAME BREAKING):
- Everything is in Russian by default instead of English so you need to search in settings and figure out how to change language even you don't know a word of Russian
- Russians everywhere I can't communicate or understand anyone
- You can't change the controls...the Shift is crouch, sometimes C is inventory sometimes I is inventory its very confusing
- Changing to a different Server is hard to find since its set as a little planet button on bottom right which is hard to notice or think that its a button at all
- Walking feels weird its like you are sliding on Ice
- Pickaxe is a much powerful weapon then a gun and its used a lot more then a gun
- Not very good FPS game since your enemy is sliding from one side to another which is annoying
- You start with a gun...yup just a gun and a pickaxe....and gun fires slow, has only around 40 bullets and its weak...at least some kind of rifle would be nice to start with in a freaking FPS game
- Has micro-transactions so for those who pay will ♥♥♥♥ other players who have regular guns with their machine guns
- Voting system which kicks a player they think is cheating which is nice but they will kick anyone who does good in game even though not a cheater
- HACKERS....yes there are hackers here and you can easily spot them in Hide and Seek game since they instantly find anyone in just seconds no matter how good they hide...you will notice that they don't even hit other things around just the players that are hidden which is impossible to have that kind of luck hitting first object and its a 100% player
- Game mod called Run does not even load at all...its just stuck at loading so never had a chance to try it out
- Your Map that you build on resets when you re-log into the game so whatever you have build on it in Free Build Mod you wasted your time even though you pressed Save before you left

- In Game Coins no matter how much you collect with gameplay it will all reset once you re-log to the game again...that means you cant even collect for a gun at all...you cant buy anything and you are stuck with a boring gun....(GAME BREAKING)....this is the one that made me said THIS IS JUST ENOUGH"




Conclusion:

This game even though looks like a potential good game it obviously has developers that are more interested in making money from it then having a good playable game....the game just needs a lot of work and improvements to get a thumbs up for me...the Cons of this game are just terrible and so bad that makes the entire game bad"

reviewText:
I didn't play much but I managed to play enough.
Pros:
1: It's a small file ( Takes no time to download and install and none to be deleted)
2: It's a poor man's Minecraft (Free)
3: It's good for new or young gamers and can introduce them to the sandbox genre.

Cons...
1: The games menus are hard to navigate due to the menus being in russian. (This can be changed)
2: Even on the english setting the instructions are in russian
3: It's hard to build anything due to a lack of Nerd Poleing"

Conclusion...
It is a good game for a New gamer who has limited funds or is new to the P.C however is limited due to microtransactions for items and the menus being in russian at heart. This would be a great game with the following proposals:
1: Translate the instructions and place them under a controls tab.
2: Add more variation to the starter blocks and make the blocks you have to pay for free but hard to aquire
3: I am unsure if the feature was in place at the time of my review but perhaps add a free flying ability
4: Something to set it apart from the other block placing games like customizable vehicles or even a more exploration based theme.
I know that game development is hard
date: especially in small groups but I believe that with some fine tuning this game could be a winner. The only improvement I can suggest that I truly hope makes it
hoursPlayed: into the game is that it takes a step away from minecraft and loses the blocky charm in favour of a more rounded theme just to give it some edge over the competition. Overall it is a fun game with only a few small issues and is fun to play alone or with friends.\nI give it a 2.5/5 so your half way there. Keep up the hard work and I hope you take my reconmendations on board

reviewText:
I didn't play much but I managed to play enough.
Pros:
1: It's a small file ( Takes no time to download and install and none to be deleted)
2: It's a poor man's Minecraft (Free)
3: It's good for new or young gamers and can introduce them to the sandbox genre.

Cons...
1: The games menus are hard to navigate due to the menus being in russian. (This can be changed)
2: Even on the english setting the instructions are in russian
3: It's hard to build anything due to a lack of Nerd Poleing"

Conclusion...
It is a good game for a New gamer who has limited funds or is new to the P.C however is limited due to microtransactions for items and the menus being in russian at heart. This would be a great game with the following proposals:
1: Translate the instructions and place them under a controls tab.
2: Add more variation to the starter blocks and make the blocks you have to pay for free but hard to aquire
3: I am unsure if the feature was in place at the time of my review but perhaps add a free flying ability
4: Something to set it apart from the other block placing games like customizable vehicles or even a more exploration based theme.
I know that game development is hard
date: especially in small groups but I believe that with some fine tuning this game could be a winner. The only improvement I can suggest that I truly hope makes it
hoursPlayed: into the game is that it takes a step away from minecraft and loses the blocky charm in favour of a more rounded theme just to give it some edge over the competition. Overall it is a fun game with only a few small issues and is fun to play alone or with friends.\nI give it a 2.5/5 so your half way there. Keep up the hard work and I hope you take my reconmendations on board
